title: Looking to trade PSA for SGC
author: Mattymc727

posts.post_title: Looking to trade PSA for SGC
posts.post_content:
Looking to trade my PSA 4 Boston Kleinow for an SGC 4 or above Kleinow. Willing to add cash on top as well.

Matt

Have you considered sending it to SGC for a crossover? They’ll reslab it for you


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

That’s certainly the backup plan! But I’d like to do a straight swap and save money if available. Or upgrade…

The SGC pop report has over 200 Kleinows at 4 or 5, some of you have them!
